Same problems here.  He calls 'Tocar', of which he has no excuse for (if he 
even IS a BW fan), and when I said that I was the descendant of Optimus 
Prime, he called ME power-hungry!  Then he made up a G1 story that Prime died 
in the end of G1.  Now I know that they wouldn't allow death in the show, 
even the Rebirth.  Did he read my profile?  We are friends, not rivals.
